entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Coaticook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lennoxville 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

Humidity: 73 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
